name: Ignited
description:
Ignited - A survival online game

You have to keep your fire alive with sticks that you can find in your world. This game is online, so you have to try gain the most point to be at the top!

Use a water bucket to put out the fire of your enemies! you can also freeze them so that they are unable to move.

-Controls-

WASD to move

Enter to pick up items

Shift to use items

Arrow keys  or numbers to navigate inventory

Keep your fire alive!
